attributes.action: Change Societies Views On Debt by making 'Credit Cards' change the Name to 'Debt Cards'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plainly Credit Cards are not only given out far to freely, but many 'Cardholders' do NOT understand them properly. If Credit Cards were known as 'Debt Cards' [By Law] and a 'Warning' [Based on the principles used for cigarettes & alcohol warnings] was sent out with statements & on the cards, much  misery might been avoided.
